effect.name: Planes Blur
effect.description: Set an expression for the box radius in pixels used for blurring the corresponding input plane.
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.lr
Luma radius
parameter.comment: Radius of the luma blurring box

parameter.name: av.lp
Luma power
parameter.comment: How many times should the boxblur be applied to luma

parameter.name: av.cr
Chroma radius
parameter.comment: Radius of the chroma blurring box

parameter.name: av.cp
Chroma power
parameter.comment: How many times should the boxblur be applied to chroma

parameter.name: av.ar
Alpha radius
parameter.comment: Radius of the alpha blurring box

parameter.name: av.ap
Alpha power
parameter.comment: How many times should the boxblur be applied to alpha
